title: Three American ballads
creator_contributor_role: University of California. Dept. of Theatre Arts. Motion Picture Division, production company
subject_group: Music & Performing Arts/Folk music - United States
Music & Performing Arts/Music - Interpretation (Phrasing, dynamics, etc.)
description: A series of humorous sketches and semi-abstract drawings are used to interpret three American ballads - "Acres of Clams", "Old Dan Tucker" and "John Henry". The artist, Alfred Kousel, has provided innumerable still sketches which combine colour, a feeling of strength and a variety of emotional effects in harmony with the moods and rhythms of the ballads. The ballads are sung by Cisco Houston.
